project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Second Inland Waterways Project is to provide more efficient and productive Inland Waterway Transport (IWT) services which would be more competitive than the current services.  This would be achieved through reduction of unit cost and transit time by: (a) upgrading Inland Waterways infrastructure to allow navigation of larger size vessels; (b) increasing shiplock capacity to reduce waiting time; and (c) increasing financial and organizational capacity of IWT agencies. The project components in Guangdong Province include: (a) renovation of Zhaoqing-Huatiaomen and Lianhuashan-Shawan-Ronggui (L-S-R) Waterways; (b) enhancement of maintenance dredging capacity and operational management; (c) technical assistance for institutional development and implementation support and training; (d) resettlement, monitoring and maintenance during implementation; and (e) tax and duties.  The project components in Jiangsu Province include: (a) construction of five shiplocks; (b) technical assistance for institutional development and implementation support and training; (c) resettlement, design, and monitoring; and (d) tax and duties.

P003619.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>内河航运项目二期</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目目的是帮助中国的广东和江苏两省建立效率更高并能与公路、铁路等其他运输模式竞争的内河航运服务，降低单位运输费用和时间，通过改造水路基础设施允许较大型的船只通航；增大船闸能力减少等候时间；提供与远洋船舶的直接联系以减少转运时间和成本；加强内河航运部门的财务管理和组织机构能力。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
